segments.text: I see a kitchen scene, quite typical at first glance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The lighting suggests it's daytime, bright and airy.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: An adult woman is standing by the sink, drying a plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her focus seems entirely on the task at hand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But I notice the sink is actively overflowing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water is pouring over the front edge in a continuous sheet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: A puddle is already forming on the floor around her feet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can't believe she hasn't noticed any of this yet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One of her feet is actually submerged in the water.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's quite shocking how oblivious she appears to be.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The water will surely cause damage to those cabinets.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wonder how long it's been overflowing like this.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Her expression remains perfectly calm, which is truly perplexing.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a disaster waiting to escalate even further.
segments.speaker: PAR
